sourceMeaningMnemonic: You feel like a <radical>stone</radical> (<radical>again</radical>!). When you feel like a stone, your body is feeling very <kanji>stiff</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Touch your stiff body. It feels like a stone.
readingMnemonic: You remember how you used to cure these <kanji>stiff</kanji> body times: your old friend <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja> would just massage them out for you.
readingInfo: If only you could ask <ja>こういち</ja> to give you massages again, but he's too busy for you, now (being emperor and all).
